body.p: Read a report about the success of Gentoo at the Linux World Expo 2005 in San Francisco! Learn how to build a Gentoo box into your car! Or how to set up a high-performance VDR-System for less than 500 Dollars! Read on in our Gentoo Weekly Newsletter! Furthermore we sum up the threads on the gentoo-developer-mailinglist, provide a couple of press articles, and show you a nice tip for tweaking your system.
